name: landed anchovy by-catch, fresh to generic market for marine fish | marine fish | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21710/documentation

This is a linking (transfering) activity which links landed anchovy by-catch, fresh, to the generic market for marine fish. Lnaded anchovy by-catch, fresh are a by-catch of landed anchovy. By-catch of anchovy includes all non-target fish species that are captured during the fishing of anchovy. As they have a market value they are linked to the market for marine fish.

The activity starts with the reception of landed anchovy by-catch, fresh.

The activity models the part of landed anchovy by-catch, fresh which contributes to the generic market for marine fish.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
